data.message: I sent a message about A recovering my brothers account as he is deceased or removing his profile all together!! What do I need to do???

replies.message: We're so sorry for your loss, Angelica. If someone has passed away, it's our policy to memorialize their account. You can learn more about memorialized accounts here: http://bit.ly/2pTWqtb. Please let us know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else we can help you with. -Jessica
